title: Percentage of e-commerce in total U.S. Q4 retail sales 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
Quarter Q4 '19 has 2.5 times more Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales than Quarter Q4 '10 which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
Quarter Q4 '19 has 2.5 times more Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales than Quarter Q4 '10 which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
Second maximum Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is found at Quarter Q4 '18.
Quarter Q4 '10 has 2.5 times less Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales than Quarter Q4 '19 which is the highest.
Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales at Quarter Q4 '19 is 11.5 , second place is Q4 '18 at 10.1, and thirdly is Q4 '17 at 9.1.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales has declined over the past 10 Quarters.
The highest value 11.5 at Q4 '19 is almost 1.55 times larger than the average value 7.43.
